title: That feeling when you get a 5 man gank at 7 minutes.

replies.body: You need serious insane skills and a seriously insanely bad opponent to get 10/0 at 7 minutes

You should create a smurf account and play a snowbally champ like Riven/Yasuo/LeBlanc etc.

It's easier than you think

And then I'm ruining somebody's game.

I don't want to do that.

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Darkstar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5Z7Jpwbj,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-27T15:16:07.852+0000)
>
> And then I'm ruining somebody's game.
> 
> I don't want to do that.

You are my favorite person.

When I smurf I usually play an off-meta support >.>
.....and play it like a support
I kind of want to do this. Like, new players won't know I'm using a "support" so I might feel bad for taking advantage of them but....I just can't pass up {{champion:34}} support.
I hate it when ppl smurf so they can feel strong against level 5s, just let them learn how to play without dealing with the shitty community. Sir, I respect you for not doing that
And while youre at it just go to a playground and start beating up all the little kids so you can feel good about yourself in real life too!
No, you just need one with REALLY HIGH move speed (I mean come, they made it back 10 times in 7 minutes.)
that's assuming the jungle and mid didnt roam to your lane ...

{{champion:17}} Guys, I'm not dying fast enough. Even I'm pissed that teemo isn't dying enough.
{{champion:72}} Here, I'll cover your missing deaths.
{{champion:103}} Ditto.
{{champion:236}} Pay it forward teemo.
{{champion:17}} On it.

HOW MANY TICKLES DOES IT TAKE TO MAKE {{champion:420}} LAUGH?

TEN-TICKLES

Her secret passive is three on hit tickles. The on hit passive shall be three, no more, no less. Three shall be number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, neither count two except that thou proceed to three. Five is right out.
As a top laner this speaks to me on an amazingly high level... Like Platinum tier level...
